title: University of Cincinnati Homecoming
text:
University of Cincinnati Homecoming 
Updated: Fri, Oct 23 2015, 10:54 AM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- It's homecoming weekend at the University of Cincinnati and that means there's plenty to do for Bearcat fans. 
A kick-off party, tailgate party, and parade are all scheduled to raise school spirits.Dan Schlimberg and Mike Bohn explain what you can expect from this year's event.Follow us on Twitter @Local12 and LIKE us on Facebook for updates! Related Stories

LAS VEGAS (AP) -- While his health is getting better, Lamar Odom's legal situation might be in peril. Business News 
Cybersecurity: Senate takes initial step to bill's passage 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- The Senate is set to pass a bill aimed at improving cybersecurity by encouraging the sharing of threat information among companies and the U.S. government.
